<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#aa776a466c28ef5250df0206206360b8c">EmitCamlGlobal</a>(M, AP, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;data&#95;begin&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// emitAssembly - Print the frametable. The ocaml frametable format is thus:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   extern &quot;C&quot; struct align(sizeof(intptr&#95;t)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     uint16&#95;t NumDescriptors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     struct align(sizeof(intptr&#95;t)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       void &#42;ReturnAddress;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       uint16&#95;t FrameSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       uint16&#95;t NumLiveOffsets;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       uint16&#95;t LiveOffsets&#91;NumLiveOffsets&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &#125; Descriptors&#91;NumDescriptors&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125; caml$&#123;module&#125;&#95;&#95;frametable;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that this precludes programs from stack frames larger than 64K</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (FrameSize and LiveOffsets would overflow). FrameTablePrinter will abort if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// either condition is detected in a function which uses the GC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ocamlgcprinter-cpp-/ocamlgcmetadataprinter/#a6abb5b979094dd3eba1a0375a96e365a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ocamlgcprinter-cpp-/ocamlgcmetadataprinter/#a6abb5b979094dd3eba1a0375a96e365a">OcamlGCMetadataPrinter::finishAssembly</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcmoduleinfo">GCModuleInfo</a> &amp;Info,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcmetadataprinter/#a47b1796e5c0a56e8a36cf39ae2d051a5">AsmPrinter</a> &amp;AP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IntPtrSize = M.getDataLayout().getPointerSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac189a157a6aab76ea837c13ec615dbc9">OutStreamer</a>-&gt;switchSection(AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a0580b05cc0794957d4ac1ce2f209ac87">getObjFileLowering</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectfileinfo/#af1e49c4350a67d9c442c39ab1dc211eb">getTextSection</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#aa776a466c28ef5250df0206206360b8c">EmitCamlGlobal</a>(M, AP, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;code&#95;end&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac189a157a6aab76ea837c13ec615dbc9">OutStreamer</a>-&gt;switchSection(AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a0580b05cc0794957d4ac1ce2f209ac87">getObjFileLowering</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectfileinfo/#afd9ae84447d7be72e18fd897b3f036d2">getDataSection</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#aa776a466c28ef5250df0206206360b8c">EmitCamlGlobal</a>(M, AP, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;data&#95;end&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#aa776a466c28ef5250df0206206360b8c">EmitCamlGlobal</a>(M, AP, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;frametable&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDescriptors = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;GCFunctionInfo&gt; &amp;FI :</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this function is managed by some other GC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Very rude!</span></CodeLine>
